entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 11.
